extendedInfo.description: Catan 3.0: âCities and Knightsâ expansion (IAP) now available, numerous optimizations to base game!"Catan", the legendary strategy game provides gaming fun anytime, anywhere.True to the original game, you can compete with up to four players for the most settlements, the longest roads and the largest army. You can trade with each other and claim the precious land with all its resources. If there are no other players available, various Catanians, each with their own individual characteristics, will prove themselves worthy competitors: the pirate Jean, who knows no compromise, Vincent the merchant, who never allows himself to be cheated, Sean the knight, who takes what is rightfully his... The popular Catan expansions âSeafarersâ and âCities and Knightsâ are available as In-App purchases.The complete Seafarers expansion includes more than 10 additional scenarios with an extensive campaign. Become Harbormaster, discover new islands and extra game elements like ships, gold fields, treasures and pirates. Ahoy! The Cities and Knights expansion introduces various new gameplay mechanics that add even more variety to Catan. Invest new trade goods in city improvements to build one of the three metropolises of Catan â but beware of the barbarians attracted by Catanâs new wealth! Youâll need your best knights to fend them off! C&K contains a short campaign and 7 challenging maps. Features: - Available languages: English, German, French, Dutch, Spanish, Portuguese- Optimized for standard and high resolution smartphones - Original "Settlers of Catan" rule set - Hot seat multiplayer mode - Smart computer opponents with individual strategies - Scrollable game board including zoom option - Freely combinable game settings - Game statistics - Comprehensive tutorial - Seafarers LITE: New scenario "The 4 Islands" and two additional game variants - Cities and Knights LITE: Test the new expansion in the scenario âThe first Islandâ- 3 different graphic sets to choose from ***** Suggestions for improvements and feature requests? Mail to android@usm.de We are looking forward to your feedback! When contacting our support team, please provide details on the type of device and Android OS version used as well as a detailed description of the issue. Thank you!For news and updates follow us on www.facebook.com/UnitedSoftMedia and www.twitter.com/USM_News*****Catan FAQ:Question: Why do I have to download additional files after purchasing?Answer: The download from Google play includes the basic game data and a tool that will determine your deviceâs display resolution and then download the optimal graphics data for your device. Question: which Android security permissions does Catan need and why?Answer: âStorageâ to write data to the SD or move the game data, âNetwork communicationâ to download game data and access the In App Store and âsystem toolsâ to check if Catan is already running to resume a game.Question: I bought one of the expansions but after an update, reinstallation of Catan or after restoring my phone the expansion seems gone?Answer: Donât worry; your initial purchase is already saved in your Google account. However for technical reasons you have to select âBuyâ again. Confirm and a message will tell you that youâve already purchased it. You will NOT be billed twice!Question: I lost my campaign progress after reinstalling, updating from or when restoring my phone. Is there any way to restore it?Answer: Savegames from old versions can usually be restored automatically. For all other cases weâve integrated a cheat code: Enter campaign mode and go to select player. Enter âCatanWarp*â (* = 1â15, e.g "CatanWarp5") as your player name and confirm. Exit the game via the home button. Enter your phoneâs settings menu. Select applications/manage applications/Catan/ and then âForce Stopâ. Restart Catan. The campaign can now be continued from the specified level number by selecting âNew scenario *â.*****

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: Plays just like Catan should with a great interface for interacting with the game.  The game has hot seat multiplayer, but would benefit greatly from online multiplayer.  I found the game to be buggy and freeze/crash when using an old Droid X, but since upgrading to a Nexus 4 I\'ve found the game to run smoothly with no bugs or crashes.  Perhaps it doesn\'t run the best on older devices.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice, but could be better
reviews.comment: The game is great. Graphic support for higher resolution phones could be better.  Why is there no quest-mode for the classic game, only for the add-ons?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game but needs online multiplayer
reviews.comment: Developing online multiplayer used to be hard but now with google\'s \"play game services api\" available there is no  excuse since most of the work is done for you. I would pay extra to play online (as a module) but I wouldn\'t be surprised if the buzz around a new version of catan with free multiplayer doubled the amount of game purchases
reviews.author: North Jones

reviews.title: Glitch City
reviews.comment: This game glitches half way through. It skips turns, says I don\'t have enough resources when I do. It let\'s me put roads out for computer players, etc. And it doesn\'t get fixed when force stopping the app or even restarting the phone.  Garbage!
reviews.author: Gabriela Clemons

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Good game! but I want to play it online with friends and random players....Computer cannot beat me anymore...
reviews.author: Beniamin Contiu

reviews.title: Can\'t put it down
reviews.comment: Awesome game.  Great way to pass time and the ability to save the current game and continue later is cool.
reviews.author: Trevor Kaiser

reviews.title: Much better
reviews.comment: Since the last update all of my complaints have been fixed. I\'m so addicted to this game now!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t Play Online...
reviews.comment: Would rate higher if it were possible. Still a good version but without online play its not worth the $$$.
reviews.author: mike mc

reviews.title: Well designed game but buggy on my tablet
reviews.comment: This game works well on my Samsung Galaxy Player 5 but it freezes my Galaxy Tab 10.1 almost every time and I need to do a hard shutdown. Game is well designed but AIs rarely agree to my trades. Can\'t wait to see a new version that will let me play on my tablet.
reviews.author: Marie-Josee Blais

reviews.title: Needs Online Play
reviews.comment: Great game and stays very true to the board game. However it needs online play to earn that extra star. Hot seat mode is a joke...
reviews.author: Ryan Masters

reviews.title: Fun but buggy
reviews.comment: The game is a good port from the board game, but the knights & cities expansion is buggy. The victory point totals arbitrarily change and don\'t calculate correctly all the time.  The game also is missing some cancel buttons for issues (like selecting a ship or road). I\'ve you make a choice, you can\'t back out of it. The software team doesn\'t seem to look to correct these issues in a timely way either.
reviews.author: Mark Larson

reviews.title: Frustratingly fun
reviews.comment: I watched Wil Wheaton\'s show Tabletop and saw this game for the first time. I really liked the concept of it and was excited to find a mobile app to try it out rather then drop $50 on the board game and never play it. The app is lots of fun. Its a very strategic game and i strongly suggest going through the tutorials before you jump in.  I really hope the game supports online multiplayer at some point as i have several friends and coworkers who would love to play across multiple devices with eachother.
reviews.author: Zachary Dyer

reviews.comment: WiFi issues- For everyone who comes across the issue regarding a lack of WiFi connection...make sure airplane mode on your tablet isn\'t activated. I had WiFi connection but was in airplane mode and it didn\'t download.
reviews.author: Patrick Garner

reviews.title: Out of sync
reviews.comment: Every time I try to play the turns get out of sync and I\'m not able to do anything with my own resources! Please fix. Also make a way to get out of tutorials without having to go through the entire thing.
reviews.author: Brandon Goulet

reviews.title: Just OK at this point. Glxy S3
reviews.comment: Would LOVE the game if not for the glitches that cause it to skip turns and won\'t let me use resources.  This would be five stars otherwise.  FIX IT develoment team!
reviews.author: Biggie Woods

reviews.title: Catan fan
reviews.comment: Great game. I have the basic and the cities & knights addition. It\'s only four stars because there are quite a few bugs. The game should check more often if a player has enough points (C&K). Have to go through to your turn before the game ends. Had a couple of games where it went off the rails and started behaving strangely until it crashed. C&K board can be overcrowded and the game won\'t let you select what you need to and then you are stuck. Fix the bugs and I\'d give it a higher rating.
reviews.author: Don MacLeod

reviews.title: Crashes LG
reviews.comment: Crashes my tablet every time.    Being unable to use the app, I\'ve  asked for a refund, with no response.....  Update: 3 days since purchase and refund request, still crashing my tablet, with no response from the developers.  You have delivered a poor product (for my tablet), I would appreciate a response, and refund.  In the future:  Although it may cut into your (illgotten) profits, a list of platforms the game is compatible with would be great.
reviews.author: D Therien

reviews.title: Multiplayer?
reviews.comment: Great app for fans who want to play a simple game with a computer. However this could greatly be enhanced by introducing multi player much in the same way \"words with friends\" emails you when its your turn. With such a feature this app gets old unless your just looking to kill time.
reviews.author: Eric Rich

reviews.title: Freezes
reviews.comment: Can\'t play on my asus tab. Real shame as it works great on my phone(galaxy s2).
reviews.author: David Hannon
